title: Dandanakka Lyrics Romeo Juliet Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Dandanakkaa English Meaning
"music played after
death of a person until funeral ends."
This is also used by youths
to mean "you are gonna screwed".

Singer - Anirudh Ravichander
Music - D. Imman
Lyrics - G. Rokesh
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
